commit.message: Merge branch 'jira/NMS-12886' of github.com:OpenNMS/opennms into jira/NMS-12886

nodes.bodyText: I am wondering if we can't replace this inner class with java.time.Duration? I believe it represents the same.
Maybe replace with a static method that creates a java.time.Duration?
The key of the map is never used. Can onmsApplication.getMonitoredServices() be used directly in the loop below?
This call can be moved out of the loop.
